comments:
DeletedProjectFilter is causing an attempt to load a deleted config in order to get its mapped resources. Because the config is deleted already a ResourceException is thrown.

exceptions occur during LaunchConfigurationTests.testPersistIndex()



org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: Resource /DebugTests/launchConfigurations/ConsoleInput.launch does not exist.
